website_summaries.verdict: Simple in design but supreme in function is what the Adidas Tech Response is about. Golfers are delighted that, since wearing the shoe, many have experienced an improvement in their game. Comfortable, grippy, stable, and breathable best describes the trainer. All these, albeit seemingly simple, are necessary for the game of golf.
pros: A high percentage of testers find the Adidas Tech Response extremely comfortable
The grip is commended my plenty of wearers
It works well on different terrains
Several users take notice of the stable base that this Adidas golf shoe provides
It drastically improved many golfers’ games because of a better stance
In terms of the trainers’ performance, a significant number of purchasers state that it is well worth the money
Some of the athletes find the mesh upper incredibly breathable
It comes useful and ideal when golfing during summer
Plenty of reviewers are driven to acquire this shoe because of how fashionable and versatile its style is
A couple of critics find the removable spikes very functional
cons: Numerous consumers find that not having a waterproof upper is quite inconvenient
One feels uncomfortable that the spikes are not seated properly and that they became loose during the round
Few individuals mention that it could do better with more arch support and enhanced cushioning

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, however way too small.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased athletic shoes for a multitude of uses over the years, Biking, golf, running, hiking, tennis etc. I have never purchased a product which is so tight/small for the size listed. Additionally, I didi not see that I could even return the item which was very disappointing. I purchase another pair in a larger size and am very satisfied. Please be sure to order a wider, or 1/2 size larger than you would ordinarily purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joel F. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Long, skinny golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: The picture does not do it justice. Nor, do many of the reviews. Only found one that said the shoe runs narrow and has a narrow style. So, I ordered them a size larger than I normally wear. It is a good thing. They are long for my foot, but fit tight on the width. If I returned them, I would not buy this shoe again, as the style does not fit my feet. By design, they are long, skinny golf shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome style, great value, run small
customer_reviews.text: Awesome styling, and a great value. I’ve played a couple dozen rounds with them, and they’ve held up great so far. I would say that they run a little small. I mostly wear a size 9, and occasionally need a 9.5. My last pair of adidas golf shoes were a 9. I initially ordered size 9, and they were WAY too small. Returned them successfully, and ordered 9.5. The 9.5 was still a little tight at first, but pretty much perfect after I broke them in over a couple rounds. Given that most golf shoes cost between $80 and $200, you just can’t beat this value. I plan to load up on them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: Well built, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm generally not a fan of Adidas but I read good things about these shoes so I figured I'd give them a shot. They are comfortable, and light, and look great! I've really increased my footing at the tee and can hold on better on uneven surfaces much better than in the past. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these Golf Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are my second purchase of the Adidas Tech Response Golf Shoes. On my first purchase I failed to see in the reviews that they tend to run small. I liked the shoes so much I purchased ones a half size larger and they fit perfect. Love the light weight and the low profile cleats that seems to help my swing. These are well ventilated and are not waterproof but I have played in heavy dew with no gripes. Also, these use THINtech spikes which I purchased replacements from Amazon which I also highly recommend. (Ownsig 20Pcs Black Easy Replacement THiNTech Spikes)
customer_reviews.author: Alan T

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are not only very comfortable but are wonderfully stable and offer great traction
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a shoe in the $50-60 range because I only play once or twice, at most, a month. I also wanted a shoe with soft spikes because I believe spikeless shoes would only last a couple seasons before you'd start to slip, some. These shoes are not only very comfortable but are wonderfully stable and offer great traction! The only other issue would be how long will they last but only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: wuzzup

customer_reviews.title: On the smaller side, but very nice shoes.
customer_reviews.text: The first pair i ordered, in what we thought would fit because they offered ‘wide’, which my husband likes better, We did have to return those for a1/2 size larger. He wore them last night and at first he thought they’d take a bit to get used to, but he said the transition was fast and he really likes the support they give.
customer_reviews.author: Cupcake6238

customer_reviews.title: The front is slightly pointed and cramps my little toes
customer_reviews.text: I have 11B foot size when measured in a shoe store. I have 11N foot joys that fit perfectly. I read reviews by others that say this shoe runs on the narrow side. I have a narrow foot. I figured an 11 would be fine. My big toe has about a 1/2" room which is perfect but the front is a bit pointed so my little toes are getting cramped. The front of the shoe should have been more rounded versus pointed. The shoe is light and comfortable for 9 holes. After that my little toes start to scream.
customer_reviews.author: McNystrom

customer_reviews.title: I really LIKED these
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 10W and they were very comfortable. I wore them all-day in an early morning scramble start. My feet stayed dry and the grip was very nice. I have an oddly shaped foot with a square set of toes and a narrow heel and I really liked how comfortable these shoes were. They Grey was a nice option too....looked great and the best item was the price. I only golf 5-6 times/year and I appreciated not having to lay out a huge sum for a pair of shoes that fit so well.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Geiser

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, comfortable golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Recently got into golf to have something to do outside during the pandemic and needed to pick up some golf shoes. Ordered a couple pair, these Adidas ones fit best. Great fit, very comfortable. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: grahamgg

customer_reviews.title: Adidas does it again, quality shoe at a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: I dropped 40 bones. Got this great new shoe. The triple stripes add some class to my get-up. While delivering the comfort you can expect from an Adidas product. I've bought many pairs of Adidas in my life. Awesome shoes. These are no different - the biggest plus and selling point was the fact that you can wear them on a golf course. Good shoes, exceeding the standards. For me, they are serving their purpose well. Now lets all get out there and hit some balls!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 11.5 in all my athletic shoes and I buy them often. So I got these in an 11.5 wore them for a 9 hole half round and my right toes were killing me. Probably too late to ask for a return since I wore them and they are sort of useless now. I'd call it a defect as the left shoe feels fine, but how do I prove that. Amazon if you screen these, what should I do? They really are garbage and that is where I'm going to put them if there is no return value. They clearly are not sized to a true 11.5 and the build of these shoes is very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable...I have a very wide foot, And wear an 11-12 depending on the shoe/boot. Was hesitant buying footwear without trying themon, but had no choice since the stores were shut down. So I took a shot and ordered an 11.5 wide. They fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Golf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Quality golf shoes at a very affordable price. I purchased these shoes to replace my 8 year old adidas golf shoes and I am very happy with them. The cleats dig in and stay planted nicely. I would definitely recommend to any casual golfer.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Giller

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I very rarely buy shoes online because it is difficult to know how they will fit. However, I am very pleased with these shoes. As other reviewers have mentioned, they are comfortable. I only wished they did a better job of improving my golf game! But I am happy that they make my walking the golf course more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: grendog

customer_reviews.title: First Time Golfer
customer_reviews.text: Alright, so granted i've never been golfing before.... but i have worn shoes. The Good: They're comfy, "cheap", and stylish. They gave me great grip while it was raining on the course. I have no other golf shoes to compare them to but i had zero issues with them. I would recommend and i'd buy again. My buddy who is an avid golfer actually has the same pair but in grey and stated he liked my black ones better
customer_reviews.author: C.M

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I have owned these golf shoes before and liked them so well I was glad I could buy the exact same shoe. Fits just fine. Comfortable. Good grip on spikes. Totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: CLI

customer_reviews.title: Missing cleat
customer_reviews.text: Like the shoes...fits good and really comfortable but as you can see...I received them with a missing cleat...wtf??!!
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes... but they’re gonna get dirty (white ones).
customer_reviews.text: Some of the most comfortable golf shoes I’ve ever worn. Loved them so much I ordered a black pair. White ones looked great.... the first round. Morning dew and then dry conditions/dust and the cloth part gets dirty easy. Won’t care if I find an easy way to clean. Right now though, they look like crap.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of golf shoes since metal spikes. They grip and work well. I just started playing again, and wanted an inexpensive pair. They collect longer blades of grass under the edge of the spikes - maybe all of this style do? Overall very happy so far (six rounds played, three of those walking).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and light
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my husband. Never bought Adidas before for golf apparel. Went by prior reviews in Amazon, and price was right. Every time he wears them he complements the comfort. He jokes about them looking like sneakers. He said they are feather light and comfortable. Will buy again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: WPB62

customer_reviews.title: BOTTOM OF SHOE FELL OFF !!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this shoe about one year ago for golf. Only play about once per week so I have worn these shoes maybe 40 times. The rubber cleats on the bottom are still not worn out. Today while playing golf the freakin bottom of the shoe fell off! These shoes are a joke. I guess you get what you pay for. I take care of my gear. These shoes have not been abused.
customer_reviews.author: Dexter's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Relax ....
customer_reviews.text: This is a good shoe - fits snuggish, but the material stretches so very comfortable. I’ve recently taken to ordering a 12W, but this was just a 12 and fit nicely. Any complaints about water resistance is preposterous since merely viewing the shoe it’s clear it’s not.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence Lavin

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: These turned out to be a great deal. Coming from a traditional style pair, I really like the fact they fit like sneakers, as opposed to dress shoes! It’s also nice that there is rubber tread around the cleats, making them more stable when walking on hard ground or even driving. I don’t have any real expectation that they are waterproof, and that’s ok.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Moist

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 10 Wide. Love the fit and the spike design. Don't know about the water resistant feature yet, just been wearing the on my carpet and walking around the house. Look forward to playing as soon as our early 4 inches of snow melts.
customer_reviews.author: Old Marine

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes in Feb 2019 and started using them an average of once a week. I ordered 10 W but received an 11 reg. I used them anyway, the fit was not perfect just O.K. I do not walk when playing golf so the shoes haven't received tough use. I just noticed on Monday (6-22-20) when I was cleaning them after playing golf that the sole was separating on my left shoe, bummer! I wear them an average of less than once a week and they are a little over one year old. I should think that they should last longer than that. So, buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable golf shoe right out of the box. Lightweight and well designed traction system. No spike wrench was included in mine. Reviews said go up half a size, which I did and it worked out perfect. I wear a 9.5 and bought a size 10. My son bought the same pair and he sized the same way with excellent results.
customer_reviews.author: Apalinto

customer_reviews.title: Good golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these. First pair wore out and was causing fatigue when walking 18 holes. They are good shoes but I'd suggest more for summer wear. The wet grass in the morning will definitely soak through quickly. I had to add insoles as I usually walk the whole course and my feet will start to get tired without them.
customer_reviews.author: Johnson

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves these!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband, hoping that they would fit well and that they'd be comfortable. He wore them the next day on the golf course and raved about them when he got home! Asked me how many other colors they came in!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy A.

customer_reviews.title: Not as ordered
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to purchase these for my husband at a great price as it can be hard to find decent looking wide shoes at such a low cost. We received the shoes, the order said wide, the box said wide but the shoes were normal width as that’s what their label stated and my husband’s foot proved. Not sure how it happened but feeling duped. Ended up having to purchase some Nike golf shoes that were actually wide fit and a bit more costly.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Webster

customer_reviews.title: Best value and comfortable golf shoes.
customer_reviews.text: My fussy teenager loves the look and fit of this pair of golf shoes as he refused to wear anything his father and grandfather wear. Fit is exactly as how a pair of tennis shoes from adidas would fit (10.5 for adidas and 11 for Nike). I am very happy with the price point as well. Will definitely buy more as he grows. The only downsize is it is not waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: cch in hk

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are the exact size and model of previous Addidas golf shoes these are too small.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these Addidas golf shoes to replace a pair that had given me several years of good service and fit perfectly. Unfortunately, although I purchased the same size and model these are too small. I don't like to return item but I guess this teaches me to ALWAYS go to a store and try on shoes before purchase
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin W Domurat

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and super comfortable for the first 18 holes!
customer_reviews.text: So I only used these once so far, an 18 hole round. But the fit was perfect, they are lightweight and super comfortable, with NO break-in period at all. Although they are lightweight, they felt quite stable. Because they are mesh and light, they LIKELY will NOT be good in the wet/dew conditions. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally a shoe I love!
customer_reviews.text: I NEVER write reviews. I walk the golf course every week. I am very picky about the shoes I wear. Most shoes/sneakers just don’t work for me. I have gone though many brands and have spent up to 200 bucks on a pair. I recently received these so I can’t comment on the durability but they are wonderful. Comfortable right out of the box, fits and feels great. I couldn’t be happier. For the price you absolutely can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Got these shoes during Prime days. I had been looking for some new golf shoes for a while and these looked like some really nice shoes especially for the price. I have used them probably 4 or 5 times on the course over the last month and they are great. Very comfortable and great grip on the course.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and great price.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are extremely comfortable and fit my somewhat narrow foot perfectly. I can't speak to longevity yet, but at this price, I'll have no problem buying again if I need to. I like these much more than more expensive golf shoes I've worn. I wear 11 in Converse, and 12 in most Nike shoes, and the size 12 fit me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Larry M.

customer_reviews.title: Pain in the foot!
customer_reviews.text: They are not true to size and definitely run a little bit small. One major issue was that after walking 18 holes on these my heels were very sore and they never are. I have returned these and have purchased a different pair of golf shoes from another brand that I am completely happy with.
customer_reviews.author: SoxNation

customer_reviews.title: Great golf cleats
customer_reviews.text: Great, affordable golf cleats. I've worn them all summer so far and no complaints. Since they are designed more like a running shoe I've not had any discomfort while walking courses either. I wish the cleats were just a little stiffer, but they will handle just about any terrain with great grip.
customer_reviews.author: KerryG

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe for the Money.
customer_reviews.text: Size 10 in Adidas products fit like a glove. Great shoe for the money. Comfy, durable and attractive. Great shoe as the weather turns a bit cooler as well and course plays softer.
customer_reviews.author: MPK

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've had Adidas shoes in the past but these are by far the most comfortable I have had. Fit perfectly and look just as good. Glad I got them. May even purchase in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Castro

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for buck especially for walkers.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are excellent. Very lightweight, very supportive, and very comfortable. Have yet to play on a totally wet day but my feet have stayed dry thus far. I walk every round and these have been amazing. No more blisters! And the sizing chart was spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very Very Good!!
customer_reviews.text: I expected average quality because of the lower price but the shoes should last me s long time. Very very comfortable. Good looking - a notch darker gray color than the photo but still look very sharp! Adidas have always fit my foot very well and they do again!
customer_reviews.author: Cris C. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, once I got the right size. I have size 10.5 Adidas tennis sneakers, so I ordered the same in these. And they were half size too small. 11 are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great golfing shoes
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING SHOES! Huge difference from the running shoes I used to use. Makes a difference when you encounter some wet roughs/ fairways. Would high recommend for the price
customer_reviews.author: Moses Solis

customer_reviews.title: Great budget golf shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These are decent looking, well made, inexpensive golf shoes for golfers that aren't playing every weekend and can't justify spending a ton on shoes. I've got 6 rounds on these so far this year, and can say that they're pretty comfortable, even when it gets toasty out.
customer_reviews.author: MotoHokie

customer_reviews.title: Not what the Golf Magazines said
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable golf shoe ??? No they are not, I have played 4 rounds with these, my feet are in pain after 6 holes. I had to add a real shoe cushion the standard is hard as a rock. Never will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice - Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and light but uncertain how long they'll hold up...
customer_reviews.text: These are very light and as such have a bit more give than I'd like. For walking they're very comfortable, but I have my doubts as to how long they'll hold up. For now, I'm giving 4 stars for being very comfortable and with adequate support and traction.
customer_reviews.author: Delzog

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair I ordered, this time in black. The first pair was white and got grass stains / dirty rather easy. (I wash them and still wear them all the time) I’m not having that problem with the new black pair and because they are so light, extremely comfortable, great looking, and have removable soft spikes all for a rock bottom price, I couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: 88dmc88

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes for the Price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, they are comfortable and keep me planted when I am smashing my drives 310 yards into the woods, or the water, or any other area that would be considered a hazard. Sometimes the fairway too. They wont improve your game but they will help you look good!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E Hoagland

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: My brother gave me his old pair of these shoes and I really liked the way they fit, but they were old with worn down spikes so I ordered these in white. They fit great and the first time I played in them it was wet and they kept my feet decently dry.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Gerhart

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with this shoe. Extremely comfortable, lightweight, good breathability, good grip and good looking. Hands down my favorite golf shoe I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: J. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Blisters after 2 hours
customer_reviews.text: Most painful shoe I've ever worn. I have a blister on each foot form a short round on a 9 hole course. When you first try them on they feel great. It was about 45 mins into my round that it started. I could barely walk. They rub the back of my foot with every step. The worst thing is I bought them right before they closed all the courses so now that I have had a chance to use them its too late to return them. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie, Matt and Kei

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe that I purchased to replace my old Nikes. Built more like a sneaker so don’t expect waterproof. But a very nice shoe especially if you were walking
customer_reviews.author: Eastpt

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: These run a little small so make sure you go up a size. I am usually as size 12 so the first set I ordered was way too small. I went to the 13 and it fit perfectly. These are great shoes for the price. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They fit to size and are very comfy. Only con is they are not a great winter shoe. My feet were cold this past weekend in 50 degree grey weather after a recent storm. Whaaaa.
customer_reviews.author: Kevo

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased multiple pairs of Adidas shoes most of them through Amazon and other sites and typically the shoes fit according to size and of good quality. This particular pair was way too tight and too small. Although the shoe appears to look very nice upon close review of the faux leather it doesn't seem like it will last very long. It's not a comfortable shoe. Especially for a golfer. My recommendation is don't buy this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: alfred m.

customer_reviews.title: Ok but
customer_reviews.text: Bought 1/2 size larger and fit ok but noticed shoes have a much narrower than my foot joys. Feet do get wet even in heavy dew. All in all shoes are ok for the money but don't think they will last as long as foot joys.
customer_reviews.author: the real JR

customer_reviews.title: Adidas golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice shoes, well constructed, the fit is excellent, and they are made of great material. The price was exceptional too. Recommend purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Road runner

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Just seemed alittle narrow at the toe of the foot. Would have like them to be alittle more rounded.. play only one round of golf so far while wearing them. Semi comfy for the price. Maybe I just need to break them in more..
customer_reviews.author: Odie

customer_reviews.title: They're ok
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, lightweight, quality seems to be good so far.... not very water resistant. I wore them on a particularly wet morning and had soaked socks by the 4th hole. That being said, you'd think any shoe of this material should have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: GKF

customer_reviews.title: Top quality shoe, great price!!
customer_reviews.text: He loves these. Comfortable, sharp looking, great golf shoe. His boss bought a pair EXACTLY like these at the pro shop for over $100. He loves his too, but I love the price I paid for ours better
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa G

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: These golf shoes fit/feel like running shoes. My only disappointment is in the color. The photos make them appear to be a much lighter gray, color, that the pewter/bronze that they actually are.
customer_reviews.author: BDWCEWx

customer_reviews.title: Breathable lightweight shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice light weight shoe that breathes well. I don’t golf a lot, so only used them a handful of times so far. They were everything I hoped they would be.
customer_reviews.author: Average joe

customer_reviews.title: A Comfortable Value
customer_reviews.text: Although I have not used them on the course yet. Only walking around the house on carpet. I can tell you that the shoes on first fitting are quite comfortable. Much like a good fitting running shoe. If I had one complaint I would recommend a thicker liner as you can feel the cleats through the sole of the shoe. That may well not be an issue when on the turf. Initially I would give them a high rating on comfort.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these for months now and they are perfect, great fit. If there is water on the course, expect to get them in your shoes, 0 water resistance. Many times my partner will have dry socks and i wont.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair, they fit half size small so buy half size larger. Fit and feel of these shoes is like a running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

customer_reviews.title: Quality golf shoe that fits and looks good
customer_reviews.text: The Adidas came in wide which was very import. Another very nice feature are the aggressive soft spikes. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kid Leo

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable with no break in
customer_reviews.text: These golf shoes fit me great and required no break in. Definitely cut on the narrow side for width as other people have mentioned. Worked great for me but may not for someone with a wider foot. As a side note, shot by best round of the year first time wearing them, might be my very own Forest Gump "Magic Shoes" now.
customer_reviews.author: Debra S. Culbertson

customer_reviews.title: Add a 1/2 size up  (size 10.5)
customer_reviews.text: Great looking golf shoe. Just a bit too short in length to be comfortable. Ended up returning and purchasing another brand locally as I needed the shoes for a golf tourney before they could ship me another larger pair.
customer_reviews.author: OldTimeYank

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are fine for the job
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are somewhat lightweight . They have a good arch. They hold well. They dry fast. I bought 11.5.. If they were New Balance I would have bought 11. They might run ever so smaller than normal...They are good shoes.
customer_reviews.author: PETE

customer_reviews.title: Nice Golf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great value for a nice comfortable golf shoe. I purchased it as a replacement for a similar model that had been discontinued, and am very satisfied with the quality and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: PAT MCNEAL

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: actually comfortable for a golf shoe. Just really low cut. If they made this shoe in a 3/4,it would be perfect
customer_reviews.author: Tony hopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: The black pair still look fresh after a couple of months of wear. They look like new. Very comfortable. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: BMJ

customer_reviews.title: Just a tad too snug
customer_reviews.text: I know it is hit or miss ordering shoes online, first time I did it, but overall, this pair of golf shoes should work out fine. They were just a tad snug but I'm confident they will mold to my feet after playing in them.
customer_reviews.author: Reyman

customer_reviews.title: Best bargain
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, fashionable, and inexpensive. Have two pairs, may purchase a third color. Light weight but good support and traction. Buy 'em before somebody realized what a deal they are!
customer_reviews.author: Far West

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, great fit, great price, fast delivery! This was a terrific online shopping experience, I wish all my experiences were this good! I golf a minimum of 5 rounds a week.So, these shoes get a lot of use. They last, I buy two pair, and alternate from day to day. I wash them in the washer when they get dirty. People have said Oh nice new shoes after a wash. Ha Ha. This last time I bought 2 pair of the silver and white, and an additional pair of white ones.
customer_reviews.author: David Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are NOT comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've never had foot pain in my life until I wore these shoes. They are way too tight and offer the least amount of arch support I have ever experienced. I bought these because they were the cheapest golf shoe I could find and now I know why
customer_reviews.author: Nathanael

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic golf shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I play golf 3 days a week and enjoy walking the course. Unfortunately, I deal with Achilles Tendonitis in my right foot which usually results in a very sore foot at the end of a round. Just finished a round in the Adidas Men's tech response and my feet feel great! No pain or soreness whatsoever. Buying a backup pair right now!
customer_reviews.author: Rich Fish from Glen Ridge

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great set of spikes
customer_reviews.text: These spikes are probably the most comfortable pair I’ve ever owned. They’re a perfect fit, and they have plenty of ventilation. I’ve paid double the price for golf spikes that aren’t nearly as comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Moondogg

customer_reviews.title: Narrower than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice quality shoes, but they are narrower than I expected. They are fine as long as I am using a golf car during the round, but I wouldn't want to walk very far in them. For 10 wide size I think they are more like regular 10's.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: They look good, feel good and are comfortable to walk 18 holes. I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Old Smart Man

customer_reviews.title: Great for a beautiful day of golf
customer_reviews.text: Fit was good. Design is nice. Super comfortable. I don't golf in the rain so its not a problem for me but they definitely are not even slightly water resistant. That being said I'd buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing a footjoy shoe and the sole was too soft. This adidas has a firm sole and at the same time has great support and cushion. I've noticed a huge diff already. Great looking shoe too!
customer_reviews.author: Trent A. Renner

customer_reviews.title: shoe was great
customer_reviews.text: the shoes looked great but the sizing is wrong too narrow. It was ordered by the size chart
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit and light weight. Good looking! Great price / value at around $50 for the pair.
customer_reviews.author: John Wolk

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy Gold Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a magical pair of shoes that a wizard put a spell on millennia ago that will make you the next Tiger Woods overnight? Probably not for you. Looking for a super comfy pair of golf shoes to wear that don't judge you based on your skill level? Boom. Buy 'em. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: F0URTYK

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Size is spot on. The shoes need a little breaking in as they are a bit stiff but they are quite comfortable and feel like you're just wearing sneakers. Should work out great for weekly golf.
customer_reviews.author: JenPhx

customer_reviews.title: Dry
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. Was worried about getting them wet and having my feet be wet all day but the water doesn't soak through! The mesh part was getting wet on a chilly dewy morning and I was a little nervous. But they held up great and didn't soak through to my socks. Good shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money if 50-60 bucks.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Only played one round so far, but nice shoes. Sturdy. Comfy. Look good.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Wide is narrow width
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware when ordering a wide width . The shoe is NARROW!!! NOT WIDE.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for new golf shoes with soft spikes at a reasonable price and these fit the bill (and the budget) perfectly. I can tell they will not last as long as the Adidas golf shoes that are $180 and up, but that's fine. They are light, comfortable, breathable and provide very good traction.
customer_reviews.author: Scramblingpar

customer_reviews.title: Way to large
customer_reviews.text: My kid wear size 10 or 10.5 on all Nike shoes. But the size 9.5 on this adida shoes is still way to big for him.
customer_reviews.author: A&W

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I like these golf shoes. They are comfortable but do note that they are not waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: TerryB

customer_reviews.title: Wow are these shoes amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow are these shoes amazing!!! I was a bit nervous buying shoes online but read the reviews on these and took a chance. VERY glad I did. Super comfortable, very light weight and give very good traction. Took them out of the box and wore them for 18 holes. No foot pain!!! Normally wear 8.5-9. Ordered 9M; fit is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: J. Capps

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable golf shoes! This is the second pair I purchased and only because I wanted two colors! Fits well, easy to wear, and great on the golf course!
customer_reviews.author: Mack Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Ok shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son for golf and they seemed like a nice shoe. He did complain though that they hurt his feet as there was not enough cushion in them.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes and a very good price compared to many sports retailers
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great item, reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Dislike nothing, like everything so far although it is too cold to put to use on the course! We will see what Spring brings:)
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey T. Gunderson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Golf Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Decent golf shoes for occasional golfer. Light weight but too flexible and thin for frequdnt golfer. I just like leather better.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L. Buddenbohn

customer_reviews.title: My feet are killing me!
customer_reviews.text: I just walked 18 holes of golf in these shoes and my feet are on fire. (I walk 2-3x a week). Have two other pairs of shoes. I even have an old pair of Adidas and they are better than these. Luckily I bought puma ignites and they have been fantastic since day 1. Not sure how this product is rated so high. I was so excited to try them out after seeing all the reviews and was severely let down.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy D

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Tech Response Ironmt/Ftww Golf Shoe, Iron
feature_bullets: Thintech, adituff, thintech cleat, traxion, adiwear
Lightweight mesh and synthetic upper for enhanced breathability and comfort
Soft eva insole for lightweight comfort and cushioning
6-spike configuration with thintech low-profile technology for improved traction and stability
